-- System Health Check
SELECT 
  'system_health' as metric_type,
  COUNT(DISTINCT event_name) as active_jobs,
  COUNT(DISTINCT table_name) as active_tables,
  NOW() as check_time
FROM information_schema.events e
CROSS JOIN information_schema.tables t
WHERE e.event_schema = 'mindsdb' 
AND t.table_schema = 'mindsdb'
AND e.status = 'ENABLED';

-- Knowledge Base Performance
SELECT 
  'knowledge_base_metrics' as metric_type,
  COUNT(*) as total_entries,
  COUNT(DISTINCT asset) as unique_assets,
  AVG(sentiment_score) as avg_sentiment,
  MAX(timestamp) as latest_update
FROM crypto_market_intel
WHERE timestamp >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR)

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'user_behavior_metrics' as metric_type,
  COUNT(*) as total_behaviors,
  COUNT(DISTINCT user_segment) as unique_segments,
  AVG(confidence_score) as avg_confidence,
  MAX(timestamp) as latest_update
FROM user_behavior_kb
WHERE timestamp >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR)

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'educational_metrics' as metric_type,
  COUNT(*) as total_content,
  COUNT(DISTINCT topic) as unique_topics,
  AVG(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(estimated_time, ' ', 1) AS UNSIGNED)) as avg_time_minutes,
  NOW() as latest_update
FROM educational_content_kb;

-- Data Quality Monitoring
SELECT 
  'data_quality' as metric_type,
  table_name,
  COUNT(*) as record_count,
  AVG(data_quality_score) as avg_quality_score,
  MIN(last_updated) as oldest_record,
  MAX(last_updated) as newest_record,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, MAX(last_updated), NOW()) as minutes_since_update
FROM (
  SELECT 
    'real_time_prices' as table_name,
    data_quality_score,
    last_updated
  FROM crypto_data_db.real_time_prices
  WHERE last_updated >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 HOUR)
  
  UNION ALL
  
  SELECT 
    'defi_real_time' as table_name,
    CASE WHEN tvl > 0 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END as data_quality_score,
    last_updated
  FROM crypto_data_db.defi_real_time
  WHERE last_updated >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 HOUR)
  
  UNION ALL
  
  SELECT 
    'social_sentiment' as table_name,
    CASE WHEN sentiment_score BETWEEN -1 AND 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END as data_quality_score,
    last_updated
  FROM crypto_data_db.social_sentiment
  WHERE last_updated >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 HOUR)
) data_quality_check
GROUP BY table_name;

-- Model Performance Monitoring
SELECT 
  'model_performance' as metric_type,
  model_name,
  accuracy_score,
  prediction_drift,
  error_rate,
  metric_date,
  CASE 
    WHEN accuracy_score < 0.7 THEN 'critical'
    WHEN accuracy_score < 0.8 THEN 'warning'
    ELSE 'healthy'
  END as status
FROM crypto_data_db.model_performance_metrics
WHERE metric_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
ORDER BY metric_date DESC, model_name;

-- Job Execution Monitoring
SELECT 
  'job_monitoring' as metric_type,
  event_name as job_name,
  status,
  last_executed,
  next_execution,
  CASE 
    WHEN status = 'ENABLED' AND next_execution < NOW() THEN 'overdue'
    WHEN status = 'DISABLED' THEN 'disabled'
    WHEN status = 'ENABLED' THEN 'scheduled'
    ELSE 'unknown'
  END as job_status,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, last_executed, NOW()) as minutes_since_execution
FROM information_schema.events
WHERE event_schema = 'mindsdb'
ORDER BY last_executed DESC;

-- User Activity Monitoring
SELECT 
  'user_activity' as metric_type,
  COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) as active_users_1h,
  COUNT(*) as total_interactions_1h,
  AVG(sentiment_score) as avg_sentiment_1h,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN interaction_type = 'question' THEN 1 END) as questions_1h,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN interaction_type = 'trade' THEN 1 END) as trades_1h,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN interaction_type = 'learning' THEN 1 END) as learning_sessions_1h
FROM (
  SELECT 
    user_id,
    'social' as interaction_type,
    sentiment_score,
    created_at
  FROM user_data_db.social_interactions
  WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR)
  
  UNION ALL
  
  SELECT 
    user_id,
    'trade' as interaction_type,
    profit_loss_percentage / 100 as sentiment_score,
    trade_date as created_at
  FROM user_data_db.user_trades
  WHERE trade_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR)
  
  UNION ALL
  
  SELECT 
    user_id,
    'learning' as interaction_type,
    completion_percentage / 100 as sentiment_score,
    session_start as created_at
  FROM user_data_db.learning_sessions
  WHERE session_start >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR)
) user_activities;

-- Performance Trend Analysis
SELECT 
  'performance_trends' as metric_type,
  DATE(timestamp) as date,
  AVG(health_score) as avg_health_score,
  AVG(active_users) as avg_active_users,
  AVG(total_interactions) as avg_interactions,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'critical' THEN 1 END) as critical_incidents,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'warning' THEN 1 END) as warning_incidents
FROM monitoring_dashboard_log
WHERE timestamp >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
GROUP BY DATE(timestamp)
ORDER BY date DESC;

-- Resource Utilization Monitoring
SELECT 
  'resource_utilization' as metric_type,
  'database_size' as resource_type,
  SUM(data_length + index_length) / 1024 / 1024 as size_mb,
  COUNT(*) as table_count
FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE table_schema = 'mindsdb'

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'resource_utilization' as metric_type,
  'active_connections' as resource_type,
  COUNT(*) as connections,
  0 as table_count
FROM information_schema.processlist
WHERE db = 'mindsdb'

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'resource_utilization' as metric_type,
  'query_performance' as resource_type,
  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MICROSECOND, start_time, NOW())) / 1000 as avg_query_time_ms,
  COUNT(*) as active_queries
FROM information_schema.processlist
WHERE db = 'mindsdb' AND command != 'Sleep';
